Item.body_html:
You have been assigned a new change management activity in Aras Innovator (details below). Please log in to Innovator to complete the work.

Activity: ${Item[@type="Activity"]/name}
Instructions: ${Item[@type="Activity"]/message}

${Item[@type="ItemType"]/label}: ${Item[2]/item_number}
Title: ${Item[2]/title}

 ${substring("Some information needed to form this email was not found. Please contact your system administrator to ensure that the sender has privileges to view the items.", 1, (1-count(Item[2]))*158)}
Item.query_string: <Item type="Activity" id="${Item/ActivityId}" action="get" select="name,message"/> <Item type="${Item/@type}" id="${Item/@id}" action="get" select="item_number,title"/> <Item type="ItemType" id="${Item/@typeId}" action="get" select="label"/>
Item.subject: New Innovator Activity: ${Item[@type="Activity"]/name} for ${Item[2]/item_number}
Item.name: CM Activity Notification
